comments.text:
+Adam Garcia Listen.. there is no need for you to be racist because it 
makes you look ignorant  and I am not a gringo. I have been all over 
Bolivia. I've been to La Paz, Cochabamba, Sucre, Concepcion, Santa Cruz, 
and Oruro. Its all about partying and money for Bolivians and the society 
is completely divided. I could careless if you dont believe me, go there 
and see it for yourself. Santa Cruz and La Paz is the 2 worst cities out of 
all of them.
comments.author: LordSear1982

comments.text:

and shitty mcdonald, hahaha.
comments.author: Adam Garcia

comments.text:
Yeah let me tell you something... Evo Morales produces AND sells cocaine in 
fact him and Hugo Chavez built a highway solely for distributing cocaine 
from La Paz to Brasil. The only reason why Evo hates Obama is because he 
told Evo to get his cocaine problem in the country under control. He said 
no and Obama pulled every major American textile manufacturing company out 
of Bolivia and made a deal with Peru instead. Thats over 20,000 Bolivians 
who lost jobs because of Evo so next time try to do a little more 
investigation before you speak.
comments.author: LordSear1982

comments.text:

comments.text:
Jimmy Carter would be the last President whom I can recall acting 
honorably. At least he showed that that was possible. Before Carter, maybe 
Eisenhower, who warned us about the Military-Industrial-Congressional 
Complex...
 
The well-earned disdain, to many folks, overshadows any good which is done 
by the U.S. And yet most of the world loves our popular culture; go figure 
;->
